title: Best of The Herd: 10/03/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/03/2019
description:
Colin explains why the one thing nobody in the NFL can figure out is how to stop Russell Wilson.  He points out that most NFL players want to play in New England despite the fact that they never pay anyone and don't have any fun. Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks to Colin about what is going wrong with the Rams and what the Saints did to slow down the Cowboys offense. Plus, Colin makes his top 3 college football picks in the Marquee 3.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
